body: Is it just me or has ug dj been dead lately? what has happened to the plug dj team thing they had.
body_tagged: Is it just me or has ug dj been dead lately? what has happened to the plug dj team thing they had.
title: Plug Dj Dead!!!?!!!

replies.body:
Idk actually.

I haven't been updated on Avicus recently but I kinda felt this aswell
replies.body_tagged:
Idk actually.

I haven't been updated on Avicus recently but I kinda felt this aswell

replies.body:
^

Please, could you explain in-depth by what you mean, dead? We're organizing events every Friday and still have people coming to them.

If you're talking about Plug.DJ team applications, I haven't had a chance to sit down and discuss them with Skylar yet.
